sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Petrus Cunæus of the common-wealth of the Hebrews. Translated by C.B. Cunaeus, Petrus.
[24], 166, [16] p.
Printed by T.W. for William Lee, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Turks Head in Fleet-street over against Fetter-Lane, London : 1653.
With a half-title. Original not traced. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 28 1652"; the '3' in the imprint has been crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[24], 166, [16] p.
Printed by T.W. for William Lee, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Turks Head in Fleet-street over against Fetter-Lane, London : 1653.
With a half-title. Original not traced. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 28 1652"; the '3' in the imprint has been crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
William Lee
T.W.
his shop at the sign of the Turks Head in Fleet-street over against Fetter-Lane
